import sys

import xml.etree.ElementTree as etree

def get_attr_number(node):
    # your code goes here

    return len(node.attrib) + sum([get_attr_number(child) for child in node])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    sys.stdin.readline()
    xml = sys.stdin.read()
    tree = etree.ElementTree(etree.fromstring(xml))
    root = tree.getroot()
    print(get_attr_number(root))


import sys
import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET

def get_attr_number(node):
    # your code goes here
    count = 0
    for child in node.getchildren():
        count += len(child.attrib)
        count += get_attr_number(child)
    return count

if __name__ == '__main__':
    sys.stdin.readline()
    xml = sys.stdin.read()
    tree = ET.ElementTree(ET.fromstring(xml))
    root = tree.getroot()
    print get_attr_number(root)

import sys
import xml.etree.ElementTree as etree

def get_attr_number(node):
    # your code goes here
    return len(node.attrib) + sum([get_attr_number(child) for child in node.iter()])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    sys.stdin.readline()
    xml = sys.stdin.read()
    tree = etree.ElementTree(etree.fromstring(xml))
    root = tree.getroot()
    print(get_attr_number(root))


import xml.etree.ElementTree as etree

maxdepth = 0
def depth(elem, level):
    global maxdepth
    # your code goes here
    if (level == maxdepth):
        maxdepth += 1
    
    for child in elem:
        depth(child, level + 1)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    sys.stdin.readline()
    xml = sys.stdin.read()
    tree = etree.ElementTree(etree.fromstring(xml))
    root = tree.getroot()
    print get_attr_number(root)

import sys

def get_attr_number(node):
    # your code goes here
    return len(node.attrib) + sum([get_attr_number(child) for child in node]) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
